name: WKInterfaceSwitch
desc: An interface element that toggles between an On and Off state.

items.name: func setTitle(String?)
items.desc: Sets the switch title to the specified string.

items.name: func setAttributedTitle(NSAttributedString?)
items.desc: Sets the switch title to the specified attributed string.

items.name: func setOn(Bool)
items.desc: Sets the state of the switch to the specified value.

items.name: func setColor(UIColor?)
items.desc: Changes the tint color of the switch when it is on.
